SELECT s.id, q.type, q.quest_title AS questTitle, s.schedule_title AS scheduleTitle, l.longitude, l.latitude FROM tb_quest_schedule s LEFT JOIN tb_quest q ON s.quest_id = q.id LEFT JOIN tb_quest_location l ON s.location_id = l.id WHERE q.school_id = #{schoolId} and q.is_deleted = 0
and type != 0
and type != 1
and type != 2
and l.longitude IS NOT NULL and l.latitude IS NOT NULL ;

SELECT s.id as scheduleId, s.quest_id as questId, s.schedule_title as scheduleTitle, sl.id as scheduleLogId, FROM tb_quest_schedule s LEFT JOIN tb_quest_schedule_log sl ON s.id = sl.quest_schedule_id AND sl.user_id = #{userId} WHERE s.is_deleted = 0 AND s.quest_id = #{questId};

SELECT s.id AS scheduleId, s.schedule_title AS scheduleTitle, l.longitude, l.latitude FROM tb_quest_schedule s LEFT JOIN tb_quest_schedule_log sl ON (s.id = sl.quest_schedule_id AND sl.user_id = #{userId}) LEFT JOIN tb_quest_location l ON s.location_id = l.id WHERE s.is_deleted = 0 AND s.quest_id = #{questId} AND sl.id IS NULL;
